definition: to handle correctly
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
authenticated/solid/firm/real/true
variant of 確|确[que4]/variant of 埆[que4]
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
On the correct handling of internal contradictions among the people, Mao Zedong's tract of 1957
pinyin: zheng4 que4 chu3 li3 ren2 min2 nei4 bu4 mao2 dun4
containing_words.word: 正确处理人民内部矛盾

sentences.english: Third, we correctly handled the contradictions among the people arising from the new situation.
sentences.chinese: 三是正确处理新形势下的人民内部矛盾。

sentences.english: When one treats the mushroom correctly, it thrives , germinates, and will accompany its owner for life.
sentences.chinese: 当正确处理菌菇，繁殖，发育，和陪伴主人终生。

sentences.english: Well-behaved applications provide enough information to process a document correctly.
sentences.chinese: 行为良好的应用程序提供正确处理文档的充足信息。

sentences.english: How to correctly handle young pigeons in this free animal care video.
sentences.chinese: 如何正确处理在这个自由的动物护理视频雏鸽。

sentences.english: Always properly handle return values of functions returning references of dynamically allocated memory.
sentences.chinese: 始终正确处理返回动态分配的内存引用的函数返回值。

sentences.english: We must handle the contradictions among the people correctly.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须正确处理人民内部矛盾。

sentences.english: The importance of criminal law theory is to correct to deal with importance self-evident card of criminal case.
sentences.chinese: 刑法理论对正确处理刑事案件的重要性不证自明。

sentences.english: We should correctly and consciously handle the relationships between the core and leadership collective.
sentences.chinese: 核心也要自觉正确处理好与领导集体的关系。

sentences.english: The accompanied fracture should be properly treated in cases of torsion injuries.
sentences.chinese: 扭转伤引起的病例常伴有带骨块撕脱应正确处理。

sentences.english: Conclusion: To find placental abruption early and treat correctly can decrease danger of pregnancies and infants.
sentences.chinese: 结论早期发现胎盘早剥及正确处理可降低孕婴危险性。

sentences.english: Ninth, handle the relationship between the experimental village and non-experimental ones.
sentences.chinese: 九是正确处理新农村建设中试点村与非试点村的关系。

sentences.english: A Study on Intra-Party Harmony of the Communist Party of China;
sentences.chinese: 正确处理党内矛盾是巩固和发展党内和谐的重要途径。

sentences.english: So is "On the Correct Handling of Contradictions Among the People".
sentences.chinese: 《关于正确处理人民内部矛盾的问题》也是好的。

sentences.english: If you did all correct you will see the pedestals also are rotating.
sentences.chinese: 如果你正确处理了，你会看到基座也开始旋转了。
